name: 200 Labs, Inc.
description: Developer of a no-code chatbot platform intended to automate communication with humans through messaging applications. The company's platform helps to build a bot without coding to automatically start conversations with prospects from post comments to increase lead generation and qualification, upsell, cross-sell, and boost revenue on WhatsApp, enabling e-commerce marketers and business owners to increase sales, reduce costs and automate support through chatbots.
one_liner: Developer of a no-code chatbot platform intended to automate communication with humans through messaging applications. The company's platform helps to build a bot without coding to automatically start conversations with prospects from post comments to increase lead generation and qualification, upsell, cross-sell, and boost revenue on WhatsApp, enabling e-commerce marketers and business owners to increase sales, reduce costs and automate support through chatbots.
